pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: まさかのときに備えて貯蓄せよ。
lessons.english: Keep something for a rainy day.

lessons.japanese: まさかのときには貯蓄に頼ればよい。
lessons.english: In an emergency you can fall back on your savings.

lessons.japanese: いつかは君も貯蓄の重要さを悟るようになるだろう。
lessons.english: Some day you will come to realize the importance of saving.

lessons.japanese: 老後を安心して暮らしたかったら今から貯蓄を始めなさい。
lessons.english: If you want security in your old age, begin saving now.

lessons.japanese: 毎月の収入の一部を貯蓄すれば損はない。
lessons.english: It will pay you to save a part of your salary each month.

lessons.japanese: 彼は娘の名義で毎月収入から１万円貯蓄した。
lessons.english: Every month, he saved ten thousand yen out of his income for his daughter.

lessons.japanese: 彼の両親は彼の大学教育に備えて貯蓄をしている。
lessons.english: His parents are saving for his college education.

lessons.japanese: 将来に備えて貯蓄しておきなさい。
lessons.english: Put by money for the future.

lessons.japanese: まさかのときに備えて貯蓄せよ。
lessons.english: Keep something for a rainy day.

lessons.japanese: まさかのときには貯蓄に頼ればよい。
lessons.english: In an emergency you can fall back on your savings.

lessons.japanese: いつかは君も貯蓄の重要さを悟るようになるだろう。
lessons.english: Some day you will come to realize the importance of saving.

lessons.japanese: 毎月の収入の一部を貯蓄すれば損はない。
lessons.english: It will pay you to save a part of your salary each month.
